title: Creatures in clay: ceramic sculpture by Rosemary Wren
creator_credit: J M Anderson Films and Films for Potters
brief_description: This film about pottery shows in some detail, Rosemary Wren’s technique of building large figures, using T-shaped coils, and making small models by thumbing and pinching.
